Klasse FloorData

java.lang.Object
com.wegapplikation.config.model.FloorData
public class FloorData extends Object
The FloorData class manages the persistence and manipulation of floor information within the application. It loads floor data from a file, provides methods for adding, updating, and deleting floors, and saves changes back to the file.

    Modifizierer und Typ
    Klasse
    Beschreibung
    static class 
    FloorData.Floor
    Represents a single floor entity with an ID and a lock status.

    FloorData()
    Constructs a FloorData object and initializes the list of floors by loading existing data from the file.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • FloorData

      public FloorData()
      Constructs a FloorData object and initializes the list of floors by loading existing data from the file.

  • Methodendetails

    • addFloor

      public void addFloor(int id, boolean locked)
      Adds a new floor to the system and persists the change to the file.
      Parameter:
      id - The unique identifier for the new floor.
      locked - The initial lock status of the new floor.

    • updateFloor

      public void updateFloor(int oldId, int newId, boolean locked)
      Updates the lock status of an existing floor identified by its ID. Note: This implementation only updates the lock status; the floor ID remains unchanged.
      Parameter:
      oldId - The ID of the floor to be updated.
      newId - The new ID (currently not used for update logic but maintained in the signature).
      locked - The new lock status to set for the floor.

    • deleteFloor

      public void deleteFloor(int id)
      Deletes a floor from the system based on its unique ID and persists the change.
      Parameter:
      id - The ID of the floor to delete.

    • getAllFloors

      public List<FloorData.Floor> getAllFloors()
      Retrieves a copy of the list of all floors currently loaded in the system.
      Gibt zurück:
      A new List<Floor> containing all floor data.
